channel.title: Bandos Shop making
channel.description:
i tried 2 make bandos shop twice with fairy shop keeper
i got the NPC and everything but the shop thing dont work :(
plz can some1 do the coded 4 me and tell me were 2 put it? i use HYIASCAPE V2 if it makes the difference...
in tht shop i would like: Item id: 15348 Bandos chestplate Item id: 15349 Bandos tasset Item id: 15346: Armadyl chestplate Item id: 15347: Armadyl plateskirt
and all of them 10k each :)
thanks if you can

item.title: Bandos Shop making
item.dc:creator: @mickey-carter mickey-carter
item.description:
@mickey-carter wrote:

[quote=“Mary|Jane, post:4, topic:198348”]I know, and he won’t respond.

What a bitch, waste of my time.[/quote]lol sorry iwas away
umm i want like 99999 in stock

and just those items tht r on list plz

Read full topic

item.title: Bandos Shop making
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

[quote=“Mary|Jane, post:2, topic:198348”]You want those items, for 10k each?

How many of those do you want in stock?

Do you want Bandos Boots too?

Do you want Armadyl Helmet too?[/quote]

Wow…you’re actually helping someone. Damn…

Read full topic
